name: Quetzalcoatl (itch) (RoyalTG, azza5442)
description:
Quetzalcoatl is an isometric 3D dungeon crawling game, where the player will explore a dangerous dungeon temple filled with traps, the player will explore, and collect a forbidden idol and race to escape with their life.

* We Currently recommend using a Controller for Optimal playing Experience*

Keyboard

  •  arrows  to move
  • z- use item
  • x- pick up
  • c/v change selection

Controller 

  • Left stick to move
  • X to pick up
  • Y to use 
  • left/ right bumper to select
